ch.powerunit

Interface Statement<P,T extends Throwable>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of the parameter
    T - the exception type
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Statement<P,T extends Throwable>
    Definition of a statement (piece of code that can thrown Throwable).

    A statement can be used inside test (to isolate a code that must thrown an exception) and are used internally by the framework to compose and execute test sequence element.

    Author:
    borettim

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(P parameter)
  throws Throwable
        Executable code.
        Parameters:
        parameter - A parameter for the statement
        Throws:
        Throwable - in case of error.

      • andThenAlways

        default Statement<P,T> andThenAlways(Statement<P,T> after)
        Aggregate this statement and then the following. The second statement is done, even in case of exception in the first one.
        Parameters:
        after - the next statement
        Returns:
        the new statement

      • andThenOnlySuccess

        default Statement<P,T> andThenOnlySuccess(Statement<P,T> after)
        Aggregate this statement and then the following. The second statement is done except in case of exception in the first one.
        Parameters:
        after - the next statement
        Returns:
        the new statement

      • around

        static <P,T extends Throwable> Statement<P,T> around(Statement<P,T> internal,
                                                     Statement<P,T> before,
                                                     Statement<P,T> after)
        Build a around statement (do something, then something others, and after one a third statement, event in case of exception.
        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of the parameter
        T - the exception type
        Parameters:
        internal - the internal part
        before - the first statement
        after - the last statement, done event in case of exception.
        Returns:
        the new statement.

      • reflectionMethod

        static <P,T extends Throwable> Statement<P,T> reflectionMethod(Object target,
                                                               Method method)
        Build a statement based on a method-
        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of the parameter
        T - the exception type
        Parameters:
        target - the target object
        method - the method
        Returns:
        the new statement.
